Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Monopol in Puerto de la Cruz, you'll be minutes from Church of Nuestra Senora de la Pena de Francia and Ermita de San Juan. This hotel is within close proximity of Plaza del Charco and Risco Belle Aquatic Gardens.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 92 guestrooms featuring refrigerators and flat-screen televisions. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (complimentary).

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and a spa tub. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge) and concierge services.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Monopol. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the hotel pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk and an elevator (lift).


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2:00 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Monopol. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the hotel pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

With a stay at Hotel Monopol in Puerto de la Cruz, you'll be minutes from Church of Nuestra Senora de la Pena de Francia and Ermita de San Juan. This hotel is within close proximity of Plaza del Charco and Risco Belle Aquatic Gardens.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Church of Nuestra Senora de la Pena de Francia - 0 km / 0 mi
Ermita de San Juan - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Plaza del Charco - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Risco Belle Aquatic Gardens - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Sitio Litre Garden - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Taoro Park - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Casino Puerto de la Cruz - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Lago Martianez Swimming Pools - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Mirador de La Paz - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Castillo San Felipe - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Garden Beach - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Botanical Garden of La Orotava - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Loro Parque - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Pueblo Chico - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Bollullo Beach - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Monopol is Santa Cruz de Tenerife (TFN-Tenerife North) - 21.3 km / 13.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
